entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
